sourceName.title: Source Name
sourceName.description: Name of the tender source to process (e.g., 'adb', 'wb', 'ungm'). Leave empty to process all sources.

processAllSources.title: Process All Sources
processAllSources.description: If set to true, all available sources will be processed

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for GPT-4o mini access

supabaseKey.title: Supabase Key
supabaseKey.description: API key for your Supabase instance

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of tenders to process in each batch
